Posts.Content: Sep 20, 2008 08:01AM bmorgart wrote: Beautifully said and I couldn't agree more but those pretty faces admitting they have breast cancer or any cancer is our best way of getting the publicity and raising the money that is needed for the research to hopefully some day find a cure.  Look what a few public individuals admitting they had AIDS has done for AIDS.  It use to be a death sentence but no longer is.  Knowing I have Stage IV BC and seeing the actresses looking beautiful and talking about their struggle and now their cured irritates me as much as you but I have to hope more people will contribute to the cause because of it.
Posts.Title: Long, but need your opinion LuAnnH mom2acat
